item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Quick Facts name: Felix Adam Klein born: April 10th, 1994 nationality: Austrian email: felix@felix.dev web: https://felix.dev github: https://github.com/fekle linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/fekle Education 2000–2004 • VS Cottagegasse Primary School 2004-2012 • AHS Schopenhauerstrasse High school with focus on IT and Communication Technology 2010 • Trinity College London C1.1 English Certificate 2011 • Phillips Academy Summer Session 5 weeks of summer university in the US 2013-2017 • University of Applied Sciences Technikum Wien Bachelor of Science in Engineering (Computer Science; BSc) Work Experience Oct 2008 - Nov 2008 • m.
